name: Food 2048
description:
This application is a puzzle which is based on the 2048 game.
User has to swipe to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same character, they merge into a more character. When 2048 character tile is created, user will win.

Features:
- Swipes work for grid area
- User can replay game
- User can see current score and best score
- User can see point table for puzzle
Category of game mode:
1-Fruits
2-Vegetables
3-Food
4-Drink
5-Chocolate
6-Breakfast
